title: Respond to a fixed price offer
description: Accepts or rejects a fixed price offer.
permission_required: MyTradeMeWrite: Maintain your watchlist, answer questions and post comments.

fields.name: ListingId
fields.description: The ID of a listing which has a current fixed price offer associated with it.

fields.name: Accept
fields.description: Indicates whether or not to accept or reject the fixed price offer.

fields.name: ShippingOption
fields.description: The preferred shipping option which will be used when this request happens to be the winning bid. The value is an numeric ID that is returned from the listing detail request (in the ShippingId field). Required when accepting the offer.

fields.name: Quantity
fields.description: Indicates the number of items to buy. Only applicable to Buy Now only auctions. Defaults to 1.

fields.name: FirearmsLicence
fields.description: The user's firearms licence number. This is required for firearms purchases.

fields.name: FirearmsLicenceHolder
fields.description: The user Enters First, Middle, and Last Names associated to the firearms licence.

fields.name: FirstName
FirstName
fields.description: First name of Licence Holder. Required;

fields.name: MiddleNames
fields.description: Middle Names of Licence Holder. Optional;

fields.name: LastName
fields.description: Last name of Licence Holder. Required;

fields.name: ReturnListingDetails
fields.description: Indicates whether full listing details should be returned in the Listing field.

fields.name: IsBuyerOlderThan18
fields.description: The user agrees they are older than 18. This is required for wine purchases.

returns.description: <FixedPriceOfferResponse> Details on whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the error, if the operation failed.

fields.name: PurchaseId
fields.description: The ID of the purchase (only available if the offer was accepted).
